caption: The video begins with the man lying in a hospital bed, and his girlfriend comes to visit him. She speaks to him with words of comfort, trying to alleviate his situation. After a while, his brother also comes to see him. However, their conversation seems to end on a sour note. Both of them shed many tears, indicating that the emotions are running high and that the situation is quite upsetting for both parties involved.
